message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and features, I believe a starting price of $15,000 is fair. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but $15,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Hi Bob, thanks for your interest. While I appreciate your offer, $10,000 is significantly below my bottom line. Could you meet me halfway at $13,000?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $13,000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product. Can you consider this price?
